items.label: Buy a Personal MOBIB Card
items.description: Go to a KIOSK at a major station.

items.label: Load Subscription
items.description: Monthly or Yearly. Don't forget to validate every trip!

items.label: Install Transport Apps
items.description: STIB Mobile, SNCB (for trains), and Citymapper.

items.label: Learn Airport Trick
items.description: Bus 12 is cheaper than the train to the airport, but requires a special ticket from the machine.
